span.span: if the environment name is ; otherwise, .

remarks.span: 环境名称 "开发"、"生产" 和 "过渡" 作为应用程序开发人员的实用程序提供。

span.span: The environment names "Development", "Production" and "Staging" are provided as a utility for application developers.

remarks.span: 库作者应避免将特定行为耦合到这些环境名称。

span.span: Library authors should avoid coupling specific behavior to these environment names.

span.span: Environment names are generally specific to an application.

remarks.span: 设计为在许多不同的应用程序中使用的库应避免将行为耦合到特定的环境名称。

span.span: Libraries designed for use in many different applications should avoid coupling behavior to specific environment names.
